text: The Beechcraft King Air is a twin-engine aircraft designed and built in USA. It is built in two major series: King Air 90 and King Air 100. It used as light business aircraft and light transport aircraft. Beechcraft Super King Air is a modern variant. == Military variants == Beechcraft King Air are known in the US Army as U-21 Ute, for light transport duties. In US Navy it known as T-44 Pegasus, a trainer. Category:Civil aircraft Category:United States Navy aircraft Category:United States Army aircraft
title: Beechcraft King Air
